A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I’ve come to understand that many people are not fans of this film\, but I happen to completely disagree with them. I think that the popular opinion of this film has led many to a similar conclusion without giving it a second thought. It captivated me from beginning to end\, and it made me feel something which is how I grade films most of all. There are particular moments I think are idiotic\, but it isn’t something that recurs throughout the picture so I can’t hold this against it. Give it a chance I beg of you\, and please go into it with an open mind.
